package.name: acdk_sql_sqlite
package.title: ACDK SQLite (acdk_sql_sqlite)
package.shortdescription: acdk_sql_sqlite provides a easy to use desktop database accessible via standard JDBC-like ACDK SQL interfaces.
package.copyright: Copyright © 2005 by Roger Rene Kommer, artefaktur SQLite C library is in the Public Domain. see also: %ref[sqlite_license]
package.description:
acdk_sql_sqlite is a ACDK wrapper for the SQLite database - a small but powerfull file based desktop database.
It supports most of the SQL92 features (including views, triggers).
With acdk_sql_sqlite it is also possible to define own SQL function as (not) stored procedures defined in C++ or CfgScript.
